map_address: 1 vista montana near north first street
posting_body: Domain Apartments is in San Jose/Silicon Valley, home to the world's leading technology companies.
This community is minutes from the Tasman Light Rail conveniently close to major freeways.
With shopping and restaurants just outside your door, Domain Apartments is where you want to be.
Our stunning apartments feature 9 Foot ceilings, beautiful kitchens with granite counters and in-home washer and dryers.
Residents can work out in our cutting-edge fitness center, mingle in the indoor/outdoor resident lounge or relax in one of the poolside cabanas.
This is the perfect place to call home—this is your Domain.

This apartment home comes with a gourmet style kitchen with all stainless-steel appliances, 5 burner gas stove, full size stackable washer/dryer appliances, and central AC/heat also come standard in all of our apartment homes.
Domain offers modern amenities such as 24/7 Fitness Center, Clubhouse, year round heated pool, and media center.
Domain also sits right across the street from a shopping and dining plaza including popular choices such as Target, Chipotle, Panera, CVS Pharmacy, Panda Express, and more!
Leasing Office is open to the public.
We are offering virtual, in-person, and self-guided tours!
Leasing Office Hours:
Monday: 9am-6pm

Call us for more details or visit our website!
